com.tymeac.base

Class MonitorExceptionHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tymeac.base.MonitorExceptionHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Thread.UncaughtExceptionHandler

    public final class MonitorExceptionHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Thread.UncaughtExceptionHandler
    This is the catch for exceptions from the Monitor. Tymeac cannot run in a production environment without a monitor. When an uncaught exception arises in the Monitor, this class brings the Server down in an orderly manor.
    Since:
    6.1
